page.title: 12Employment in Marnhull.
page.content: About 50% of the population is retired.Of those employed,the chief occupations are professional and scientific,agricultural related,and private services.Of secondary importance are manufacturing, construction,distributive trades, insurance and banking.The majority leave Marnhull to work.Employment within the village is largely on farms and in the shops.One farm has a small sideline constructing agricultural buildings,and there is a joinery works.Pubs,shops,schools and garages employ a few full-time,but more part- time.Generally Marnhull provides a place to live for those who work elsewhere.Unemployment is low,less than 5%. The YOUTH CLUB meets on Wednesdays in the Village Hall. Games are played and 'pop'records are enjoyed.
